Articles.Content:
Oh my God someone help me.

For my first ship I used the Lander Can as my first part, I put it facing upwards not really thinking about it, but now that I'm testing it it makes it a pain to fly and aim! I want the main command module to be a probe facing forwards, but there's no way to do it! I deleted the can, placed a probe, but I can't connect it anywhere useful! I've tried editing the files for HOURS doing things that would make complete sense, like swapping the locations with another probe, but instead just corrupt the whole file but NOTHING works! Someone PLEASE help. I will NOT rebuild this thing!
add a docking port to the front and control from there
I don't want to have to do that every time.

Thank you, Zekes. I shall implement this procedure posthaste!

I fixed it for you.
So no one else has any other ideas?

So no one else has any other ideas?

Just restart. Thats the only other option I could think of

Noooooooooo

Welp. I give up. Looks like no battles for me.
no take off the lander can take a different main command pod facing forward and then add back the lander can.
I said even if I added a new pod I couldn't attach it anywhere useful. I want to attach it in the middle of the craft put it just has a spasm and wont let me.

Noooooooooo

Welp. I give up. Looks like no battles for me.

Literally the only way to make it work is to switch to another control location after launch. Even if you add on a million RC units, control will still default to the first manned pod you place.

Alternately, place a manned pod inside the ship where it's safe, then add the lander can as decoration after.

I said even if I added a new pod I couldn't attach it anywhere useful. I want to attach it in the middle of the craft put it just has a spasm and wont let me.

Hit Alt + F12 while in the SPH/VAB and click "Allow Part Clipping in Editors". That should cure the spasm.

Literally the only way to make it work is to switch to another control location after launch. Even if you add on a million RC units, control will still default to the first manned pod you place.

Alternately, place a manned pod inside the ship where it's safe, then add the lander can as decoration after.

Drek Has same problem, i just fly unmanned. Lander can is good distraction
I just can't get the ship to attach to the probe core the way I want it to. If anyone wants to try I can give you the craft file.

I just can't get the ship to attach to the probe core the way I want it to. If anyone wants to try I can give you the craft file.

Send it? -.-..-.-.-.

The file? Okay.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B6r1qNKmBVMeRzJTYm5BbFZGV1k/edit?usp=drive_web

Get the probe on top of it facing forward somewhere in the ship where it isn't interfering with anything and is in the center.

O_o

I get the distinct impression you want this thing to explode...

Edit:

Fixed. I placed it clipped inside the central fuel tank.

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=07226428992812036869

Edited November 3, 2013 by daemonCaptrix
Why? Is it bad? But thanks anyways.

Well it has a partially-exposed fuel tank as its main spine.

Edit:

Is that fix what you were looking for?

Duum dum dum dum dum daa da da da da.

(Note ten minute later versions used an inline mini rockomax)

Edited November 3, 2013 by Spartwo

Funny how you said that having a partially exposed fuel tank was wanting to explode, considering how that is exactly how the Burai is built, and you couldn't take it down!

Also, have you taken your turn or are you at work or something?
The probe was upside down but I got it fixed. Thank you!!!

Funny how you said that having a partially exposed fuel tank was wanting to explode, considering how that is exactly how the Burai is built, and you couldn't take it down!

Also, have you taken your turn or are you at work or something?

My last ship to move, Neptune, is on clean-up duty. The last Black Knight ship with any weapons, The Lady of Britannia is her target.

Neptune fires three shots and somehow misses at close range. A fourth shot vapourizes the RC unit, disabling the ship. Then a fifth shot fires accidentally. xD

Persistence:

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=33325632156995537107

PS:

Spartwo, do I have to mop up all his ships that have no weapons left in order to claim victory?

Edited November 3, 2013 by daemonCaptrix
sry i didn't see the file. Im on it now.
What missiles should I use for a fighter?

What missiles should I use for a fighter?

Sepratrons and a half meter fuel tank/probe/battery/Xenon/RCS tank/Octagonal strut.

@Daemon:Well if the ships have no way of fighting back they're useless,You may as well shoot them up for fun.But yes if that was the last ship you win.

Edited November 3, 2013 by Spartwo

sry i didn't see the file. Im on it now.

ok

i ll take my turn tomorrow after church and lunch with my Gf
